name: Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies!
name_original: Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies!
description:
Dungeon Rummage - Rise of the Allies is a short dungeon crawler created for the Harold Jam 2023, Ascend of the Allies. Pick your character and escape the dungeon, where the allies are currently held hostage.

Features:

  • Full voice acting. Every character is fully voiced.
  • Simple combat system with timed inputs and flashy skills.
  • 3 different playstyles. Each character has it's own way of fighting.
  • Collect monster crystals and Lari to buy augments for your gear or rest at the inn.
  • Augment your equipment with bonus stats, cooldown reduction & more to increase your combat capabilities.
